title: containerd on RHEL 8.10
description: A step-by-step guide to installing containerd on RHEL 8.10.

steps.description: These modules are essential for container operations.
steps.command:
sudo tee /etc/modules-load.d/containerd.conf <<EOF
overlay
br_netfilter
EOF
sudo modprobe overlay
sudo modprobe br_netfilter

steps.description: The containerd.io package is typically available from the Docker Community Edition repository.
steps.command:
sudo dnf install -y yum-utils
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo

steps.description: Containerd needs to be configured to use the systemd cgroup driver.
steps.command:
sudo containerd config default | sudo tee /etc/containerd/config.toml
sudo sed -i 's/SystemdCgroup = false/SystemdCgroup = true/g' /etc/containerd/config.toml

steps.description: Enable and start the containerd service.
steps.command:
sudo systemctl enable --now containerd
sudo systemctl restart containerd
